title: Import error
body_html:
Hi,

I have built the Docker image successfully, but when I want to run a script, it crashes on import torch command. Here is the error:
File "/opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py3.6/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module> from torch._C import *
ImportError: libcuda.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
Can anyone help me with this?
